comment: lectures are very entertaining. 1 weekly assignment after reading the chapter is all that is graded except a midterm & final (both online) some days were lit playing kahoot & the questions are the same on the test. final project was a 1500word presentation about wtv you want. i didnt go to class from mid-feb thru end of sem & got a 98. hard to fail

Professor Kish was a very kind and understanding professor. He is a police officer who has a lot of interesting stories and makes his lectures interactive by bringing in guest speakers. It is impossible to fail this class because he does reviews for the midterms and the final, which are essentially the same questions on the exam.

Professor Kish is an absolutely amazing professor. He is a police officer who makes lectures that should be boring interesting with personal anecdotes and professional knowledge. It is impossible to fail his class unless you refuse to do any work. There is a weekly SRQ, 2 open-notes exams, and 1 medium length essay with a short presentation.
Very kind and understanding. Has a cool history with the criminal justice system.

Very simple and easy criminal justice class. Professor Kish is very passionate about what he's teaching and only wants to inspire his students. There is a paragraph discussion assignment every week and he gives word for word answers to the midterm and final.
Steve was a great professor and overall great guy. Listening to his lectures were very interesting and informative and I recommend him 100%.

Mr. Kish was a great teacher and bascially gives you the anwsers for the mid term and final exam so just take notes on the test review in class. The weekly assigments are the easiest things ever. Overall great would def take him again.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Respected--Graded by few things

comment: Prof Kish is amazing!! He is a very experienced police officer that is a lot of fun! His classes are just PowerPoints and attendance isn't mandatory. There is a weekly review question (super easy), two tests which he gives the answers to, and a final paper (also easy). Overall such a great professor and great person. I definitely recommend him!!

Kish is an amazing professor. Class is made to get you interested in law not to be difficult. All the people in my class loved him and some even switched their majors because of him. Grades are based on a midterm and final (that he gives you the answers to) as well as a weekly assignment and final paper (both are extremely easy). 10/10 recommend.

Mr. Kish did an amazing job teaching his CRJU class this fall. The weekly assignments were straight to the point and never a surprise, the homework takes five minutes to do and you're done for the entire week. His reviews for the mid-term and final are really good and I seriously doubt anyone didn't get an A on both of them.

Professor Kish was awesome all you have to do is answer one question from the textbook every week and there is a very easy midterm and final that you literally can only fail if you don't do it. There is a paper at the end of the year and a presentation of it that is it. The class was awesome and I recommend everyone take him!!!!
Best professor ive had at ksu so far. Honestly super inspiring and sweet. Makes it easy to do work and will not let you fail... Take him!
One of the most chill professors I've had by far.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Mr. Kish has been the best teacher that I've had since being at KSU. He is very chill, very laid back and the weekly work is so easy. At the end you have to do a little presentation about what you've learned but it was nothing to stress about. He was very lenient with that too. I highly recommend him to get some easy credit. The sweetest professor!

He is a super chill professor that doesn't really assign homework the only big grade we had was an essay but that's about it and even that was pretty easy. He marks attendance so it's better to show up to get on his good side. There is a textbook that you have to use but definitely get it online.

Easy A, there is no way to fail. Only 1 weekly assignments & its answering a textbook question w your opinion. You need the textbook for the homework but you could honestly get it from a friend, all you really need is the review questions from it.  1 essay/ in class presentation, midterm and a final. Love him!! Hes down to earth and really caring
